title: Powercut to return after O/L exam
body_lines: The Public Utilities Commission of Sri Lanka (PUCSL) today approved the scheduled powercuts from June 2 to 5.
Accordingly, a two-hour power cut will be imposed on June 2 and 3 while one hour powercut will be imposed on June 4.
There will be no powercut on June 5. (Chaturanga Samarawickrama)
